title: Big tech shot in ZEE`s arm! Technology & Innovation Centre unveiled in Bengaluru - WION
content: Big tech shot in ZEE`s arm! Technology & Innovation Centre unveiled in Bengaluru  WION
description: The state-of-the-art facility was inaugurated by the Chief Minister of Karnataka, Basavaraj Bommai, in the presence of Amit Goenka, President – Digital Businesses & Platforms, ZEE and Nitin Mittal, President – Technology & Data, ZEE.
